results.title: Computational and Biological Evaluation of beta-Adrenoreceptor Blockers as Promising Bacterial Anti-Virulence Agents
results.text_hl: There are several advantages, this strategy does not affect @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ growth and so it will not induce @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ resistance and will also not destroy the @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ normal flora.

results.title: Characterization of the Anti-Biofilm and Anti-Quorum Sensing Activities of the beta-Adrenoreceptor Antagonist Atenolol against Gram-Negative Bacterial Pathogens
results.text_hl: Furthermore, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ effect on @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ growth was attested by comparing the optical densities and @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ counts of control untreated @<m>DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ cultures and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-treated cultures.
